page.title: 08BELMONT P.T.A.
page.content: The Parent Teacher Association at Belmont Primary School started in 1980. A new{committee}is elected each year. If parents have a child at the school they are members of the Association until their child leaves. The P.T.A. raises money to help pay for extra{equipment}to assist in the {education}of the children. Of the many events it has held the hardest to organise was a seven mile race and fun run. This was difficult because it involved most of the villagers and also the police. The P.T.A. has supplied many things for the school including climbing ropes,video recorder, spirit duplicator, tee shirts for sports, part of the cost of a holiday for juniors at Whitley Bay,a cupboard for the computer and part of the cost of the{computer}itself.
